companyDescription: S P Setia is a pioneering force in property development, with projects in Malaysia, Australia, Vietnam, the UK, Singapore, Japan and China. The company's portfolio includes townships, integrated developments, eco-sanctuaries, luxury enclaves and high-rise residences, as well as commercial, retail and industrial spaces.
